9.title: Escape Pod 9 Dave Snyder, Makeup Effects Artist
9.plot: TOPIC - Hollywood makeup and special effects artists Dave Snyder talks about his career from low-budget features and television projects to Full-scale Academy award-winning Hollywood feature productions.

18.title: Escape Pod 18 with Guest Katja Glieson Singer, Songwriter, Actress
18.plot: Guest Katja Glieson, Singer, Songwriter, Actress Katja writes her own songs and music video concepts, often with a story line inspired by her life experiences and struggles with obesity, bullying, abuse and low self-confidence.

31.title: Escape Pod 31 with Guest P Anastasia, Author
31.plot: Interviewed at OMG Con P. Anastasia Author of the science fiction tetra-logy, Fluorescence.

32.title: Escape Pod 32 Guest Felecia Angelle Voice Actress
32.plot: Interviewed at OMG Con guest Felecia Angelle / Voice Actress joins David to talk about her recent work on The Hero Emilia/ Emi Yusa in The Devil Is A Part-Timer, Perona in One Piece, Shinoa in Seraph of the End, Nozomi Moritomo in The Rolling Girls, Supreme Kai of Time in Dragon Ball: Xenoverse, Aoi Asahina in Danganronpa: The Animation and Alex Bendetto in Gangsta.

33.title: Escape Pod 33 Guest Moses J Moseley Actor
33.plot: MOSES J MOSELEY - ACTOR AND MODEL Moses took time between takes to give us an interview while on the set of Volumes Of Blood: Horror Stories.

34.title: Escape Pod 34 Eric Huskisson of Blood Moon Pictures
34.plot: TOPIC - Eric Huskisson joins Tony and David to talk about the Volumes of Blood: Horror Stories Premiere, and starting Blood Moon Pictures.

35.title: Escape Pod 35 Guest Logan Abell Independant Wrestler for the WWA
35.plot: Interview with Logan Abell Professional Wrestler at World Wrestling Alliance, and Independant Wrestler.

36.title: Escape Pod 36 - John Vanover Professional Drummer
36.plot: John Vanover, Professional Drummer and Vocalist shares some great stories on growing up focusing on drumming with a passion for playing drums and continuing his family legacy with his knowledge of the percussion industry. Make sure you check out the last 10 minutes for John burning up two of his classic drum sets.

37.title: Escape Pod 37 - David and Tony Are Back!
37.plot: Tony and David took some time off to remodel and rebuild the Fallout Bunker Studio and now they're back.

38.title: Escape Pod 38 OMG Con 2017 and Guest the Abusement Park
38.plot: Guest The Abusement Park ( Explicit Content ) Tony and David are live on the OMG Con main floor talking to Cosplayers and interview Guest Panelist: The Abusement Park, this wild interview you won't want to miss.

39.title: Escape Pod 39 with Guest PJ Starks & Eric Huskisson
39.plot: PJ Starks and Eric Huskisson from Blood Moon Pictures drop by the studio and talk about the Volumes Of Blood: Horror Stories Blu-Ray and DVD release on August 1st and about the Volumes Of Blood: Body Count Card Game. Plus they talk with us about Volumes Of Blood 3 is in the works.

40.title: Escape Pod 40 with Guest Independent Wrestler Scott Sexton
40.plot: "Narrator Of The Neck Breaker" Scott Sexton talks about his road to the top of the wrestling landscape.

41.title: Escape Pod 41 with Guest David Haynes Owner of ESCAPE TODAY
41.plot: Guest David Haynes, Owner of Escape Today stops by our studio to tell us all about Escape Rooms. "Do You Have What It Takes To Escape" Whether it's a birthday party, corporate event, or anything in between Escape Today in Owensboro provides a once in a lifetime experience for groups from the Tri-State area.

42.title: Escape Pod 42 with Guest Lewis Chaney and Neil Kellen
42.plot: Guest Lewis Chaney and Neil Kellen, owners of Keychain-productions LLC. a motion picture company that ranges from commercial production to independent film. They have worked on many short films, often producing and directing.

43.title: Game of Thrones Season 7 Premiere Special
43.plot: Game Of Thrones Season 7 Premiere Special with Deandra Buskill, Melissa Barnett and Andrew Barnett join David and Tony on the small council to talk everything Game of Thrones season 7.

44.title: Escape Pod 44 Guest Brian McCormick Referee
44.plot: TOPIC - Escape Pod guest Brian McCormick Independent Wrestling Referee #IndependentWrestling #wrestling.

45.title: Escape Pod 45 with Guest Actress Cindy Maples
45.plot: TOPIC - Critically acclaimed Actress/Director Cindy Maples sits down with Tony and David to talk about her career in film making.

46.title: Escape Pod 46 Game of Thrones Season 7 Finale Special
46.plot: Game Of Thrones Season 7 Finale Special with Deandra Buskill, Melissa Barnett, Andrew Barnett and Josiah Murphy join David and Tony on the small council to talk everything Game of Thrones.
